name: 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Station
description: Declutter your desk and power up your ecosystem. This sleek station charges your phone, smartwatch, and earbuds all at once. The perfect upgrade for any modern workspace.

name: Smart LED Light Strips
description: Transform any room with millions of colors. Perfect for setting the mood, creating dynamic gaming setups, or adding accent lighting to your home. Control everything from your smartphone.

name: Portable Mini Projector
description: Your personal cinema, anywhere you go. Turn any wall into a big screen for movies, shows, or gaming. It's compact, easy to use, and surprisingly powerful.
